speaker: President.
english: President. The next item is the report ( A6-0206/2006 ) by Mr Calabuig Rull on behalf of the Committee on Industry, Research and Energy on a policy framework to strengthen EU manufacturing towards a more integrated approach for industrial policy ( 2006/2003(INI) ).
original: President. The next item is the report ( A6-0206/2006 ) by Mr Calabuig Rull on behalf of the Committee on Industry, Research and Energy on a policy framework to strengthen EU manufacturing towards a more integrated approach for industrial policy ( 2006/2003(INI) ).
agenda_item: Towards a more integrated approach for industrial policy (debate)
